errors.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
errors.invalidPhone: Please enter a valid phone number
errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.
errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.

calculator.title: CRS Calculator
calculator.subtitle: Calculate your Comprehensive Ranking System score

userInfo.title: Let's Calculate Your CRS Score
userInfo.subtitle: First, we need a few details to get started. Your information is secure and will only be used to provide you with your results.
userInfo.emailHelper: We'll send your results to this email
userInfo.phoneHelper: Include country code if outside Canada
userInfo.agreement: By continuing, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy. Your information is encrypted and secure.

age.title: Age
age.question: What is your age?
age.subtitle: Age is one of the most important factors in your CRS score. Younger candidates receive more points.
age.label: Your Age
age.helper: Must be between 18 and 65 years old

education.title: Education
education.subtitle: Select your highest level of education. If you studied outside Canada, you'll need an Educational Credential Assessment (ECA).

options.two_or_more_certificates: Two or more certificates, diplomas, or degrees

education.important: Important: If you completed your education outside Canada, you must have an Educational Credential Assessment (ECA) report from a designated organization.

language.title: Language
language.subtitle: Select your language test and enter your test scores. We'll automatically convert them to CLB/NCLC levels.
language.secondLanguageLabel: I have test results for a second official language (+24 points if CLB 5+)
language.acceptedTests: Accepted Tests: IELTS General Training, CELPIP-G for English | TEF Canada, TCF Canada for French

work.title: Work Experience
work.canadianWorkDesc: How many years of skilled work experience in Canada do you have in the last 10 years? This must be full-time (or equivalent part-time) paid work in NOC TEER 0, 1, 2, or 3.
work.foreignWorkDesc: How many years of skilled work experience do you have outside Canada in the last 10 years? This contributes to skill transferability points.
work.certificateLabel: I have a certificate of qualification from a Canadian province or territory
work.certificateDesc: This applies to skilled trades. Can earn up to 50 additional points in skill transferability.
work.teer1: TEER 1: Professional jobs (usually need university degree)
work.teer2: TEER 2: Technical jobs and skilled trades (usually need college or apprenticeship)
work.teer3: TEER 3: Jobs that need technical training or high school plus training

options.none: None or less than a year

spouse.title: Spouse/Partner
spouse.spouseLabel: I have a spouse or common-law partner who will come with me to Canada
spouse.spouseLanguageDesc: Enter your spouse's CLB levels for their first official language
spouse.note: Note: Having a spouse affects your points. If your spouse has strong qualifications, they may earn you extra points. However, your individual points in some categories will be slightly reduced.

additional.title: Additional Points
additional.provincialNominationDesc: +600 points - Virtually guarantees an invitation to apply
additional.jobOfferLabel: I have a valid job offer from a Canadian employer
additional.teer1_2_3: TEER 1, 2, or 3 - Other skilled jobs (+50 points)
additional.canadianEducationLabel: I have a Canadian post-secondary credential
additional.siblingLabel: I have a sibling in Canada who is a citizen or permanent resident
additional.siblingDesc: +15 points - Must be 18 or older and living in Canada
additional.almostDone: Almost done! Click "Calculate Score" to see your CRS score and get your personalized roadmap.

results.title: Your CRS Score
results.improvementPlanDesc: Based on your profile, here are strategic ways to boost your CRS score and improve your chances of receiving an Invitation to Apply.
results.quickWinsDesc: These improvements are relatively easy to achieve and can boost your score quickly.
results.strategicMovesDesc: High-impact strategies that can significantly increase your score. These may require more time or effort.

pathways.title: Canadian Immigration Pathways
pathways.subtitle: Understanding your options is the first step to successfully immigrating to Canada. Each pathway has different requirements, timelines, and benefits.
pathways.importantNotice: Important: CRS vs. Other Immigration Systems
pathways.importantNoticeDesc: The Comprehensive Ranking System (CRS) is used only for Express Entry (permanent residence). It does NOT apply to study permits, temporary work permits, family sponsorship, or citizenship applications. Each pathway has its own requirements and evaluation criteria.
pathways.choosePathDesc: Each pathway serves different goals. Review the requirements, timelines, and costs to find the best fit for your situation.

expressEntry.title: Express Entry (PR)
expressEntry.description: Permanent residence as a skilled worker through the Comprehensive Ranking System (CRS).

studyPermit.title: Study Visa
studyPermit.description: Study at a Canadian Designated Learning Institution (DLI) and potentially transition to PR.

workPermit.title: Work Permit
workPermit.description: Work temporarily in Canada with a job offer, potentially leading to PR through Canadian experience.

pnp.title: Provincial Nominee Program
pnp.description: Get nominated by a Canadian province to fill local labor market needs. Often adds 600 CRS points.

quebec.title: Quebec PR
quebec.description: Permanent residence through Quebec's own selection system (Arrima). French language mandatory.

citizenship.title: Canadian Citizenship
citizenship.description: Become a Canadian citizen after holding permanent residence for 3+ years.

notSure.title: Not Sure Which Path is Right for You?
notSure.subtitle: Our immigration experts can help you evaluate your options and create a personalized strategy based on your qualifications, goals, and timeline.

services.title: Our Professional Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive support from planning to settlement in Canada

informationSession.title: Information & Guidance Session
informationSession.description: Expert pre-arrival consultation covering job search, CV writing, avoiding scams, and essential preparation steps

settlementSupport.title: Settlement Support Services
settlementSupport.description: Step-by-step assistance after arrival including housing, airport pickup, and essential services setup

marketplace.title: Marketplace Services
marketplace.description: Housing marketplace, verified service providers, and exclusive newcomer benefits

hero.title: Calculate Your Canada
hero.subtitle: Get your free AI-powered personalized roadmap and professional guidance for your Canadian immigration journey

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Four simple steps to start your Canadian immigration journey

step1.title: Calculate Your Score
step1.description: Complete our accurate CRS calculator in just 5 minutes

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Us
whyChooseUs.subtitle: Professional, accurate, and trusted by thousands of newcomers

irccAccurate.title: IRCC Accurate
irccAccurate.description: Our CRS calculator follows the exact official IRCC 2025 scoring rules for complete accuracy

aiPowered.title: AI-Powered Insights
aiPowered.description: Get personalized roadmaps generated by advanced AI tailored to your unique situation

dataPrivacy.title: Data Privacy
dataPrivacy.description: Your information is encrypted and secure. We never share your data with third parties

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Empowering candidates worldwide to achieve their Canadian immigration dreams through accurate tools, expert guidance, and comprehensive support.

ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.p1: Canada Immigration Services was founded with a simple yet powerful mission: to make Canadian immigration accessible, transparent, and achievable for candidates around the world. We recognized that the immigration process can be overwhelming, with complex requirements, ever-changing regulations, and a lack of clear, accurate information.
ourStory.p2: Our journey began when our founders, themselves immigrants to Canada, experienced firsthand the challenges and confusion that come with navigating the Canadian immigration system. They saw too many qualified candidates struggling to understand their options, calculate their CRS scores accurately, or identify the best pathway for their unique situation.
ourStory.p3: Today, we've built a comprehensive platform that combines cutting-edge technology with human expertise. Our IRCC-accurate CRS calculator, AI-powered pathway advisor, and expert consultation services have helped thousands of candidates take confident steps toward their Canadian dreams.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide accurate, accessible, and comprehensive immigration tools and services that empower candidates to make informed decisions about their Canadian immigration journey.
mission.belief: We believe every qualified candidate deserves the opportunity to build a better future in Canada, and we're committed to making that journey as smooth and transparent as possible.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become the most trusted and comprehensive platform for Canadian immigration, helping millions of candidates navigate their journey from initial assessment to successful settlement in Canada.
vision.envision: We envision a world where immigration is transparent, accessible, and achievable for all, regardless of where they start their journey.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do

accuracy.title: Accuracy
accuracy.description: We maintain the highest standards of accuracy, ensuring our tools align with official IRCC guidelines.

candidateFirst.title: Candidate-First
candidateFirst.description: Every feature and service is designed with candidates in mind. Your success is our success.

empathy.title: Empathy
empathy.description: We understand the challenges of immigration and provide compassionate, personalized support.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We leverage cutting-edge AI technology to provide personalized roadmaps and recommendations.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for excellence in every interaction, from calculations to consultations.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: Clear pricing, honest assessments, and transparent processes. No hidden fees or false promises.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: We believe immigration guidance should be accessible to all, regardless of background or location.

resultsDriven.title: Results-Driven
resultsDriven.description: We measure our success by the success of our candidates in achieving their Canadian immigration goals.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We're here to help! Get in touch with our team for questions, support, or consultations.

success.title: Message Sent!
success.description: Thank you for contacting us. We'll get back to you within 24-48 hours.

legalAdvice.question: Do you provide legal advice?
legalAdvice.answer: We provide general information and guidance. For official legal advice, we recommend consulting with a licensed immigration consultant or lawyer. Our consultation services connect you with qualified professionals.

dataSecurity.question: Is my personal information secure?
dataSecurity.answer: Yes, we take data security seriously. All information is encrypted and stored securely. We never share your personal information with third parties without your explicit consent. See our Privacy Policy for more details.
